long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MonitorX is a Chrome extension designed for freelancers working on Soul AI platform. Once activated, it monitors and records various user activities to ensure task integrity and efficiency. Key features include tracking mouse movements, clicks and keystrokes as well as logging websites visited and data copied or pasted. This tool is vital for maintaining transparency and enhancing productivity, ensuring that all tasks are done optimally and securely.
